components:
  securitySchemes:
    BearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
  schemas:
    Collection:
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
    Collections:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Collection'
    Product:
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        name:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        deleted:
          type: boolean
        price:
          type: number
        discounted_price:
          type: number
          nullable: true
        final_price:
          type: number
        status:
          type: string
          enum: [visible, hidden, sold_out]
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        sku:
          type: string
        barcode:
          type: string
        priority:
          type: integer
        min_quantity:
          type: integer
        max_quantity:
          type: integer
        add_shipping_fees: 
          type: boolean
        weight:
          type: number
        add_to_inventory:
          type: boolean
        is_translated:
          type: boolean
        requires_preparing:
          type: boolean
    Products:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Product'
    ProductInput:
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
      required:
        - name
        - description
    ProductInputs:
      type: array
      items:
        allOf: 
          - type: object
            required:
              - id
            properties:
              id:
                type: integer
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductInput'    
    Purchase:
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
    PurchaseInput:
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
        fullfilment:
          type: string
    Purchases:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Purchase'
  parameters:
    CompanyId:
      name: company_id
      in: query
      description: Get Company related items
      schema:
        type: integer
        
    CollectionId:
      name: collection_id
      in: query
      description: Get Collection related items
      schema:
        type: integer
      
    PageLimit:
      name: limit
      in: query
      description: Limits the number of items on a page
      schema:
        type: integer
      
    PageOffset:
      name: page
      in: query
      description: Specifies the page number of the elements to be displayed
      schema:
        type: integer
  responses:
    CountRes:
      description: Count response
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
              message:
                type: string
              count:
                type: integer
    400Error:
      description: Invalid request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: object 
            properties:
              name:
                type: string
              message:
                type: string
